Reviews.Title: new samsung camera user
Reviews.Author: Mr Bigfoot
Reviews.Content: Just received the Samsung TL 90 camera and it seems to work very well.  It's pretty intuitive and very close in operation to the Nikon camera I used to have.  The pictures all seem to come out well and I really like the 2.7" screen.  Tried to install the software and ALAS no can do.  It only works on PC's ....basically Windows software.I've got a MAC so there is no support.  It works ok since I have a printer that allows me to pull the SD card and download the photos thru that but it would be nice to be able use the editing software that is available on the CD.Maybe sometime soon Samsung will see fit to provide software for the MAC, so in the meantime unless you have a PC I'd buy another camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supplied Accessories - Rechargeable battery and AC power adapter, audio/video and USB cables, wrist strap, software CD-ROM
12.2-megapixel effective recording
3X optical zoom (5X digital/15X total zoom)
35mm equivalent focal length - 35-105mm
2.7 LCD screen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung TL90 12.2 Megapixel Digital Camera - Black
